
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/taohid/p/19023933" title="发布于 2025-08-05 20:10">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">【汇编和指令集.第2025.8期】安装汇编器</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<p>【发刊词】<br><br>《汇编和指令》今天发刊，在自媒体发达的今天，我们坚持用博客每月定期发表有关 Assembler 和 ISA 的我们相关学习经历，每期一个主题，每半年做一期汇总。<br>在目前的教材和技术发展过程中，计算机系统软件中：编译器技术得以弘扬，汇编器和指令集的知识和探索变得小众。在此，留下足迹，希望与您共勉。<br><br>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;----20250805</p>
<table style="width: 100%; height: 273px" border="1">
<tbody>
<tr style="height: 84px">
<td style="width: 8.66602%; background-color: rgba(251, 238, 184, 1); height: 84px">20250805</td>
<td style="width: 46.836%; background-color: rgba(251, 238, 184, 1); height: 84px">我们来一起安装汇编器：MASMPLUS, MASM32, HLA<br><a href="https://blog.csdn.net/empare/article/details/7490680" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">linuxmint系统下安装ＨＬＡ的方法</a><br><a href="https://fishc.com.cn/thread-248528-1-1.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">MASM32无法编译和链接小甲鱼视频教学中格式的asm文件</a><br><a href="https://blog.csdn.net/lyshark_lyshark/article/details/125847208" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">Windows10 下搭建汇编语言开发环境（ 利用 DOSBOX 和 MASM32 ）</a></td>
<td style="width: 44.498%; background-color: rgba(251, 238, 184, 1); height: 84px">MASMPLUS安装顺利；<br>MASM32需要借助DOSBOX；<br>HLA在win64状况下，安装不顺利。（HLA是:High Level Assembler）</td>
</tr>
